short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autoclicker for Netflix intros, recaps, credits and continue watching prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When installed, this extension automatically skips intros and recaps when watching Netflix content. It also automatically clicks the "Continue Watching" and "Next Episode" buttons when they appear. These functions can be enabled/disabled individually.
